description: Shirayuki Mizore is a http://anidb.net/t2516 [yukionna]. Keeping in line with Japanese mythological creatures, she has the ability to control ice at will and can form clones composed of it. She`s frequently seen with a lollipop in her mouth, as yukionna are vulnerable to warm climates and doing so keeps their bodies cool and let them melt. Mizore returns to school after a delayed absence and shows an immediate interest in http://anidb.net/ch7250 [Tsukune].
name: Shirayuki Mizore
